list_translation_mean.translate_mean: ngôn ngữ của một dân tộc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the expression of or the ability to express thoughts and feelings by articulate sounds.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was born deaf and without the power of speech
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông được sinh ra điếc và không có sức mạnh của lời nói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a formal address or discourse delivered to an audience.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the headmistress made a speech about how much they would miss her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: The Headgistress phát biểu về việc họ sẽ nhớ cô ấy bao nhiêu
